Reviews.Title: “Simply basic, unfussy hotel. Close to metro and good restaurants”
Reviews.Author: 1512P
Reviews.Content: We chose this three star hotel because of its location and the fact that we planned to spend more time exploring Berlin than sitting in a hotel room. Metro very close with an impressive range of restaurants close by. Basic comfort rooms. Basic but adequate breakfast. Breakfast room is dour not a place to linger over the weak coffee.

Reviews.Title: “Verfy good hotel! Очень хороший отель!”
Reviews.Author: dinushka_11
Reviews.Content: I am sitting in Bellevue now and waiting to go to the airport and decided to write a review while I have some time. Room was clean and spacious, Breakfast very good, stuff were very friendly and helpful, Internet fast and reliable, price per night was cheap, location is good-10 min walk to Kurfustendamm which is the main street for shopping (Oxford street in London), also you can take sightseeing bus from there. I m very happy with everything and recommend it to everybody! Комната была чистой и большой, завтра очень хороший, персонал приветливый и дружелюбный, интернет быстрый и надежный, местоположение хорошее-10 минут до Kurfustendamm, самая главня улица магазинов, оттуда можно также взять туристический автобус. В общем, я очень довольна своим пребыванием и рекомендую всем!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable stay”
Reviews.Author: joncollblackpool
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel 5 days & couldn't fault it, the room was a bit small but being solo was no real problem. The shower/toilet was immaculate, the shower powerful & easy controls. A few good restaurants nearby, & the local ambience was terrific. I recommend getting the Berlin transport pass ( I had the 72 hour one) & you can use it on U-Bahn, S-Bahn, any bus, also gives loads of discount on museums, boat trips etc..

Reviews.Title: “Poor standards, outdated, not good value-wouldn't recommend”
Reviews.Author: twinklepops
Reviews.Content: We opted for this hotel as it was in our budget range and we were happy to find a no-frills place with good transport links. We had booked 2 single rooms and when we arrived, there was a major discrepancy between the standard of the 2 rooms. Our main issue was the first room we were given which was clearly a make shift room and the bathroom was appaling. The shower and toilet cubicle were situated in a carpeted coridoor ajoined to the room. This coridoor was also a PUBLIC FIRE EXIT! In fairness it was secured with an inadequate bolt but 2 additional doors opened onto public fire escape stairs as well as into the main walkway of the hotel! It was really unerving and we did not feel comfortable! Also despite being told no one could get in, there was a lock from the main bedroom into the bathroom which contradicted this, so in the event of a fire you wouldnt be able to access the fire escape if you were asleep. I doubt this is legal and I expect this does not comply with heath and safety standards whatsoever. Either way, we did not feel safe. This was not a bathroom, it was clearly an example of utilising extra space to make an extra second rate en suite bathroom. On top of this, old carpet on a bathroom floor is both unhygenic and unpleasant. The main sleeping area of the room was basic and OK, however compared to the other single room we were given there were some big differences despite being the same price. The carpet wasn't fitted to this room, just folded at the edges of the walls and was rather grubby! The second room was fine, totally acceptable, simple but more than adequate and much nicer than the 'Fire escape room' with proper fixtures and fittings and a real bathroom. In fairness the staff dealt with our issues promptly and pretty painlessly. We explained our reasons for wanting another room and they offered to swap it and waiver the extra charges, which was commendable. Once we were in the 2 other rooms they were fine and we proceeded to have a comfortable stay in rooms that were clean and suitable. Location was OK, very quiet, and it was only 10 mins walk to the nearest U-Bahn which allows you to get anywhere in the city. There is a great diner called Route 66 just at the end of the street, there is also an allnight garage called "Come In" just up the road, handy for midnight snacks!!! Overall I would definitley stay elsewhere next time, the room drama caused unwelcomed stress to our holiday as well as wasting time. I don't feel it was good value for money and would have prefered to stay in a hostel. It wasnt the cheapest option we could have chosen but we wanted something a bit nicer, unfortunately it turned out to be a bad decision. We booked via another site opposed to directly and breakfast wasn't included in the deal. I think this sort of pension environment that is charging the rates that is it should automatically provide a breakfast to all guests in the price instead of whacking on another 7 EUROS. It was a budget option, however I think basics such as free WI-FI etc should be made accessable to guests. If the place had been cheaper I wouldnt have complained so much, but I just feel for the money we paid we could have had a far more comfortable stay in another guesthouse or budget hotel. All in all, pleasant, helpful staff but the actual place is very outdated and needs some refurbishment as well as re-evaluating their rates. Also note they do seem to allow pets as one of our rooms has just had a doggy visitor check out and the smell lingered throughout the duration of our stay! If you do stay there avoid room 8a, aside from that other rooms are adequate.

Reviews.Title: “Real disounest place”
Reviews.Author: Niea
Reviews.Content: Invents conditions never existing in your contract. The main manager ASK you for $$$ for late check-in never mentioned in your booking . Argue, ask for a written proof and be firm because she never will get you any written proof of her dishonesty! We asked for a double twin bed room and god a two separate beds room. The shower curtain and teeth glasses were repulsing... At the same price you will get better in bulowstrasse or somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “I would certainly never ever stay again”
Reviews.Author: CologneWanderer
Reviews.Content: We booked for four nights but stayed only one because we were so disappointed compared with the description of this hotel on the internet. Room was small and dingy. Towels stained, glasses dirty. No reasonable lobby area to sit and talk. Hotel refused to refund the unused nights but we preferred to write-off the cash we'd already paid and move to a decent hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean hotel in a quiet and beautiful zone”
Reviews.Author: Kzar
Reviews.Content: The staff was helpful and waited our arrival notwithstanding the 6 hours delay of our flight. The room was clean and large, only a bit cold (but it was cold outside and being June the heating was obviously off), the bathroom was wonderful. Moreover, the zone is very quiet and with beautiful houses. There are a few good restaurants around, and 2 tube stations not far.

Reviews.Title: “I Won't Be Comming Back”
Reviews.Author: LiatS
Reviews.Content: well, its starts with the fact that when we arrived they said they suddenly have a problem and they can't accept a visa and they need us to pay for the entire stay in cash and they need right now..Its a bit rude to ask for hundreds of euros in cash from a traveler on the day of his arrival..by the way it was already dark outside they couldn't wait till morning. other than that the toilet in the room were broken and it took a bit of time to be fixed mean while there are no public toilets in the hotel so we needed to pay for public bathrooms in the city. breakfast was good no complaints there. location was not so good..a bit far from the any public transportation.. after 3 days we moved to the "City Hotel am Kurfürstendamm" and it was GREAT! and at a lower price i must say! too bad they were booked for our first 3 days...

Reviews.Title: “Value for money Deffo!”
Reviews.Author: dominomags
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for in this Pension. As previous reviewers have said, it is on the second and third floors of a residential type building. The plus sides first - it is very clean and comfy enough. We spent little time in our rooms as we were out sightseeing from morning till night. Beds okay and quite a powefuI shower though bathroom is tiny. The hotel is in an excellent postion for getting around the city - 10 mins to the Ku,dam, 5 mins to the nearest U Bhan and surrounded by lovely resturants and bars. Area very clean and felt safe to us. We paid £220 for 4 nights for room only which had to be paid in cash - Yes unbelievable but they don't take cards? We paid for breakfast (E7.50 each per day) as we were leaving before 6 on our last day. Down sides - Breakfast was very meagre with tea, coffee, juice, cheap meats and cheese and a tiny offering of smoked salmon. Eggs only on 2 of the 4 days. One type of bread roll and some sliced white bread. Not VFM in my opinion but convenient. Our room was a bit small but hey what do you expect for this kind of money. Ordered a taxi and early morning call and all went to plan. All in all would definately recommend this hotel as a base for a Berlin city break.

Reviews.Title: “Beware of the scam”
Reviews.Author: Buoy-Racer
Reviews.Content: Beware of this Hotel Unfortunatley we left an item of clothing behind when we checked out of this Hotel. After phoning them they advised us they would send the item to our home country if we deposited $16.70 Euro into their bank account which we did. When we returned home and had not recieved the item we contacted Hotel Bellevue who advised us they were sorry but one of their staff had mistakenly disposed of the item - after we had deposited the money!!! What a scam, they tell you they have the item so you give them some more money and then you dont recieve the item or the money you have paid to have it returned. Not only have I lost an item of clothing but now I have lost $16.70 Euro as well I would advise any traveller to stay away from this establishment as they know there is nothing you can do to recover the money

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC”
Reviews.Author: sunshineIBIZA
Reviews.Content: We , my husbund and me , stayed for 5 days. The hotelstuff was absolutly helpful and so friendly. The room was big and modern. I thinkk it was all refubished shortly. The breakfast was excellent. Metro station was only 3 minutes walk away. Alle sightseeing stuff and very important for my husband - pubs and clubs not far away. Main-street Kürfürstendamm was just 5 minutes walk away. We will defently come back. I can recommend it for couples, familys and singles. Nice small hotel and value for the price. We've got a great offer, cause we've booked directly in the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very bad experience”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We had a horrible stay at this pension. Rooms are very low standard and the staff is extremely unfriendly and unprofessional. Its very rate that I complain about hotels but I cannot recommend this place to anybody.

Reviews.Title: “Mmm...”
Reviews.Author: corymbo
Reviews.Content: Well, me and my girlfriend stayed at Bellevue Hotel for 5 days in December... The hotel is almost a pension (it's on the second and the third floor of a small building). The room was clean but very very tiny:the toilet door couldn't get opened but a little because the bed(double)blocked it.The toilet also was very tiny:the shower box was absolutely inadeguate. The location also was not so good:we had to walk at least 500 metres to get from the underground station to the hotel and at evening we had to walk a lot to find something interesting. The staff was OK, but nothing more. I wanted to pay them with credit card but they refused to accept it and I had to pay cash (320 euros!!!). On the other side, the breakfast was excellent. I chose this hotel because it seemed better than others,and also better placed:big mistake. I payed 320 euros(2 persons) for 5 night, so it was 32 euro per day for the room. You can find hotel more central at less(i suggest east Berlin or also in Charlottenburg,that is central-western)money, or however closer to underground station.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Bellevue Berlin
HotelInfo.Address: Emser Strasse 19-20, 10719 Berlin, Germany
